location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 5 of 1854 from Colonel Henry Creswicke Rawlinson, Political Agent in Turkish Arabia, at Baghad to Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is informing the Resident that his dispatches (No. 364 and 368) for HM Charg√© d'affaires at the Court of Persia will be forwarded to their intended destination.It further reports that the Political Agent has had a discussion with Reshid Pasha regarding Shaikh Houssein Nasir's recent visit to Persia; Reshid Pasha denied all knowledge of the Shaikh enjoying asylum in Turkish territory, and has issued instructions to the effect that he is either to leave, or desist from causing any 'measures of offence against Persia' while under Ottoman protection.
